SCTX:
begin BILL_FG_Hrelvesuu
; behaveour for Larienna's nemisis
;
; script location: should be placed on "Hrelvesuu" id: 'daedroth_fg_nchur'

; variables
short once1
short count1
short LOSTest
short deathTest
float questTest


if ( MenuMode == 1 )
	return
endif

if ( once1 == 1 )
	if ( count1 == 0 )
		if ( GetLOS "Larienna Macrina" == 1 )
			; if we see Larienna Macrina, attack her
;			Say "Vo\Misc\bill_intruderalert.wav", "Intruder Alert! Intruder Alert!"
			StartCombat, "Larienna Macrina"
			set once1 to 0		; mission accomplished
		endif
	endif
	set count1 to ( count1 + 1 )
	if ( count1 > 20 )
		; check every 20 frames
		set count1 to 0
	endif
endif

if ( OnDeath == 1 )
	; when we are killed...
	if ( GetJournalIndex FG_Nchurdamz > 0 )
		; ... and if the player is on the quest ...
		Player->Journal FG_Nchurdamz 90
		set "Larienna Macrina".questOver to 1
		; ... it's over.
	endif
endif


end BILL_FG_Hrelvesuu
